about_the_game:
The Lost Desert is a open-world shooter. Main thing about is a game that works on very old PC hardware and windows version but it works on modern hardware and windows version too so it's very cross play compatible.

We are a team of two but we are committed to the development.

Maps:

  • Spawn map: It's the most finished at this point. Has 4 main buildings and a watch tower. There are lot of trees and there is a river. There is a grass in form of sprites. All of the graphics are based on settings.

  • Small desert map: It's more like a small wasteland with rusted barrels ruins old rusted fences and big rocks. This map is not very complex and it's used for a battle royal game mode.

  • Big forest map: This map is not very finished, it has 4 watch towers lot of concrete buildings. This map as the spawn map has lot of trees the same grass and lot of lakes. It's the biggest one in the game and will have way more buildings and features in the future.

  • Big desert map: This map isn't finished at all has just a few monuments and a big hill but other then that it's just a big desert.

Sub maps.

  • 3D platforming map: This is a big map with platforms and its finished.

  • A old mine map: This map is a old mine with crystals and support beams.

  • Lobby map: It's a lobby.

Current Features:

  • 4 main maps and 3 sub maps so there is a lot to explore.

  • Raccoons.

  • 2 weapons: pistol and machine gun.

  • Ammo system. Ammo boxes that fill the players ammo supply, they re-spawn on the maps randomly.

  • Day and Night cycle.

  • CRTs with animations.

  • Old buildings.

  • Simple and complex terrain. With trees, 3d or 2d water (based on settings).

  • Complex start settings menu.

  • 3D platforming map with jumping platforms.

Planned Stuff:

  • More NPCs.

  • Expansion of the big forest and big desert maps.

  • New interesting buildings in all maps.

Controls:

WSAD movement

Space Jump

Mouse camera movement or arrow keys

R to open/close doors

Esc main menu arrow keys to move in menu

Tab to show scores

V to activate gametype 2 needs at least 3 player to be useful 

F1 debug menu

F2 third person F3 first person

Ctrl Build, Alt Shoot

1 or 2 to change weapons

Main maps:

F4 is the spawn map

F5 is the small desert

F6 is the big forest

F10 is big desert

Sub maps:

F7 is the map with the platforming

F8 is cave/mine map

F9 is indoors map

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Any CPU 32/64Bit
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU/IGPU with 1Gb VRAM.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: The Lost Desert is a online multiplayer shooter game is made in the Blitz3D game engine. It works on basically any PC hardware with windows on it. It is mainly for windows 95-98 but works on XP and above to 11.
